data.name: Sharecare YOU
data.detailed_description:
The winner of the 2019 Appy Best VR App is now available on Mac and PC, with more content, bolder graphics, and enhanced features!

Sharecare YOU is a fully immersive, photorealistic simulation of the human body, enabling viewers to explore its astonishing details in full 360°. Interested in learning about a specific organ? With the click of a button, travel inside, see it in action - watch how it functions healthily and even simulate disease progression. Want to learn more? Apply our tags and labels along the way to get deeper information, medically accurate terminology and test your knowledge with our interactive quizzes. Sharecare YOU includes:

  • An ever-expanding library of more than 40 different modules to explore, including anatomy, physiology, conditions, and treatments
  • Informative labels and contextual information
  • Completely updated user interface with unique interactive controls
  • Growing library of exclusive video content
  • Voice-over descriptions and pronunciation of labels

We’re not stopping here! We’re hard at work adding to YOU’s vast library of organs, systems, scenes, and abilities, with more to come in 2022.

Interested in Sharecare YOU for VR? Find it here!

data.short_description: Sharecare YOU is an immersive, photorealistic simulation of the human body, enabling viewers to explore its astonishing details in 360°. Travel inside the body, view systems and organs in their natural state, progress through disease states, and test your knowledge with our interactive quizzes!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 6th Generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 5th Generation
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 7th Generation
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Mojave
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 4th Generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Iris® Graphics 5th Generation
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 7th Generation
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
